name: Cops & Robbers (itch) (TwistedHawk, MemoryCanyon, wolfer122, NBumgardner, KingdomCross)
name_original: Cops & Robbers (itch) (TwistedHawk, MemoryCanyon, wolfer122, NBumgardner, KingdomCross)
description:
Help! Police! 

The building is being ransacked by thieves! You're outnumbered, but use your cunning and you can help them redeem themselves by joining your ranks to stop crime! 

Use stealth to sneak up on the robbers, or plant your newly recruited cop buddies as traps and lure the robbers with your trusty police whistle. Be sure to convert all the robbers into your ranks before the time runs out! 

Controls
  • Place Cop  -  Z
  • Rotate Cop (when standing over them)  -  Space Bar
  • Blow whistle (watch out, these robbers are fast!)  -  X
